              fontSizePow: 0.6,
              fontSizeZoom: 3.1,
              padding: 0.2,
            })
          })
          .then(textSvg => { // è¨˜äº‹å…¨æ–‡ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã—ãŸSVGãŒå‡ºæ¥ä¸ŠãŒã‚‹

            // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆæ™‚ã«SVGã‚’Contextã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã¨ã—ã¦æ¸¡ã™
            createPage({
              path: '/map/',
              component: postRelationMapPage,
              context: {
                allPostRelations,
                wordCloudText : textSvg,
                wordCloudTag: tagSvg,
              },
            })

            // ã™ã¹ã¦ã®createPageã‚’å‘¼ã³çµ‚ã‚ã£ãŸã‚ã¨ã«resolveã‚’å‘¼ã‚“ã§å‡¦ç†çµ‚äº†
            resolve('OK')

}

/**
 * ï¼’ã¤ã®å˜èªã®å¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã®é•ã„ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹
 */
function countDiff(a, b) {
  return a
    .split('')
    .map((charA, i) => charA === b[i] ? 0 :1)
    .reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)
}


/**
 * æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã—ã¦å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’è¿”ã™
 */
function createWordCount(text) {

  // ã‚ˆãå‡ºã‚‹è¨€ã„å›ã—ã§WordCloudã‹ã‚‰é™¤å¤–ã—ãŸã„å˜èªã‚’åˆ—æŒ™  
  const excludeWords = [
    'æŒ‡å®š',
    'æ™‚',
    'è¿½åŠ ',
    /** (ç•¥)é™¤å¤–ã—ãŸã„å˜èª */
  ]


  /** kuromoji.jsã«ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹è¾æ›¸ã®æ ¼ç´å ´æ‰€ */
  const DIC_URL = 'node_modules/kuromoji/dict'

  /** WordCloudã§ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹å“è©ï¼ˆåŠ©è©ãƒ»åŠ©å‹•è©ãªã©ã¯çœãï¼‰ */
  const TARGET_POS = ['åè©']

  /** kuromoji.jsã§è©²å½“ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã®å€¤ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã«è¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å€¤ */
  const NO_CONTENT = '*'

  // kuromoji.jsã§å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æ
  // å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {

    kuromoji.builder({ dicPath: DIC_URL }).build((err, tokenizer) => {
      if(err){
        return reject(err)
      }

      // å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›
      const words = tokenizer.tokenize(text)
        .filter(t => TARGET_POS.includes(t.pos))
        .map(t => t.basic_form === NO_CONTENT ? t.surface_form : t.basic_form)
        .reduce((data, text) => {
          // å¤§æ–‡å­—ã¨å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã›ãšå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹
          const upperText = text.toUpperCase()
          if (excludeWords.includes(upperText)) {
            return data
          }

          const target = data.find(c => c.text === upperText)

          // å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã¯å¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã—ãªã„ãŒã€å®Ÿéš›ã®ç”Ÿã®å˜èªã¯å¾Œã®å‡¦ç†ã§ä½¿ã†ãŸã‚ã¨ã£ã¦ãŠã
          if(target) {
            target.size = target.size + 1
            if(!target.rawTexts.includes(text)) {
              target.rawTexts.push(text)
            }
          } else {
            data.push({
              text: upperText,
              rawTexts: [ text ],
              size: 1,
            })
          }
          return data
        }, [])
        .map(data => {

          // ä¸Šè¨˜å‡¦ç†ã§ä¿æŒã—ã¦ãŠã„ãŸç”Ÿã®å˜èªã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«ã€ä¸€ç•ªå¤§æ–‡å­—ãŒå¤šã„å˜èªã‚’WordCloudã®å˜èªã¨ã—ã¦æ¡ç”¨ã™ã‚‹
          // ä¾‹ãˆã°Gatsbyã¨gatsbyã§ã‚ã‚Œã°Gatsbyã‚’æ¡ç”¨
          const almostSameText = data.rawTexts.map(text => {
              return {
                text,
                diff: countDiff(text, data.text),
              }
            })
            .reduce((a, b) => a.diff <= b.diff ? a : b) // å¤§æ–‡å­—ã«è¿‘ã„ã»ã†ã‚’æ¡ç”¨ã™ã‚‹
            .text
          
          return {
            text: almostSameText,
            size: data.size,
          }
        })

      resolve(words)
    })
  })
}

/**
 * å˜èªå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«WordCloudã®SVGæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’è¿”ã™
 */
function createWordCloud({
  words, // å˜èªå‡ºç¾å›æ•°
  w, // SVGã®å¹…(å˜ä½px)
  h, // SVGã®é«˜ã•(å˜ä½px)
  fontSizePow, // WordCloudã®æ–‡å­—ã®å¤§ãã•ã®æ¯”ç‡èª¿æ•´ç”¨ä¿‚æ•°
  fontSizeZoom, // WordCloudã®æ–‡å­—ã®å¤§ãã•ã®ä¿‚æ•°
  padding, // WordCloudã®æ–‡å­—é–“ã®éš™é–“
}) {

  // D3-Cloudã«ã‚ˆã‚‹è§£æ
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    cloud().size([w, h])
      .canvas(() => createCanvas(w, h))
      .words(words)
      .rotate(word => word.size % 2 === 1 ? 0 : 90) // å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ç¸¦ã‹æ¨ªå‘ãã«è¡¨ç¤º
      .fontWeight(word => Math.pow(word.size, fontSizePow) * fontSizeZoom)
      .fontSize(word => Math.pow(word.size, fontSizePow) * fontSizeZoom)
      .font('meiryo')
      .padding(padding)
      .on('end', wordsForCloud => {

        resolve(wordsForCloud)
      })
      .start()
  })
  // d3.jsã«ã‚ˆã‚‹è§£æ
  .then(wordsForCloud => {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      /** ä»®æƒ³DOM */
      const document = new JSDOM(`<body></body>`).window.document

      d3.select(document.body)
        .append('svg')
          .attr('class', 'ui fluid image')
          .attr('viewBox', `0 0 ${w} ${h}`)
          .attr('width', '100%')
          .attr('height', '100%')
        .append('g')
          .attr('transform', `translate(${w/2},${h/2})`)
        .selectAll('text')
          .data(wordsForCloud)
        .enter().append('text')
          .style('font-size', d => `${d.size}px`)
          .style('font-family', d => d.font)
          .attr('transform', d => `translate(${d.x}, ${d.y})rotate(${d.rotate})`)
          .style('fill', (d, i) => d3.schemeCategory10[i % 10])
          .attr('text-anchor', 'middle')
          .text(d => d.text)
      
      // æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«SVGã®æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’è¿”ã™
      resolve(document.body.innerHTML)
    })
  })
}

const striptags = require('striptags');
const axios = require('axios');
const cheerio = require('cheerio');
const crypto = require("crypto");
const Parser = require('rss-parser');
const parser = new Parser({
  headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
});

const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG = 'blog';
const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST = 'blogPost';


// RSSã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå¤–éƒ¨ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’
// Gatsbyã§GraphQLã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¨ã—ã¦æ‰±ã†ãŸã‚ã«ã¯

exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, store, cache }) => {
  const feeds = [];
  
  // è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ãªã«ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã®æ–¹æ³•ã§RSSã®URLã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€
  const blogUrls = ['rss-url-1', 'rss-url-2', ];

  for(const blogUrl of blogUrls) {
  
    // rss-parserã§RSSæƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
    const feed = await parser.parseURL(blogUrl).then(feed => {

      return {
        ...feed,
        items: feed.items.map(item => ({
          title: item.title,
          excerpt: excerpt(item.content, 120),
          content: item.content,
          pubDate: new Date(item.pubDate).toISOString(),
          link : item.link,
        }))
      }
    });

    feeds.push(feed);
  }


  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã”ã¨ã«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç”Ÿæˆ
  feeds
    .map(feed => ({
      title: feed.title,
      description: feed.description,
      link: feed.link,
      lastBuildDate: feed.lastBuildDate,
    }))
    .forEach(b => {
      const contentDigest = crypto.createHash(`md5`)
        .update(JSON.stringify(b))
        .digest('hex');
      
      actions.createNode({
        ...b,
        id: createNodeId(`${INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG}${b.link}`),
        children: [],
        parent: `__SOURCE__`,
        internal: {
          type: INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG,
          contentDigest,
        },
      });
    });

  // RSSã«åŠ ãˆã¦ã€OGPã‚’å–å¾—
  const rssPosts = feeds.map(feed => feed.items).reduce((a,b) => [...a, ...b]);
  const rssPostsWithImageUrl = [];
  // Promise.allã§ã‚„ã‚‹ã¨503ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§foræ–‡ã‚’ä½¿ã†
  for (const p of rssPosts) {
    const pWithImageUrl = await axios.get(p.link, {
      headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
    }).then(res => {

      // å–å¾—ã—ãŸHTMLã‹ã‚‰OGPã‚’å–å¾—
      const $ = cheerio.load(res.data)
      let imageUrl;
      $('head meta').each((i, el) => {
        const property = $(el).attr('property')
        const content = $(el).attr('content')
        if (property === 'og:image') {
          imageUrl = content
        }
      });

      // è¨˜äº‹æƒ…å ±ã«OGPã®URLã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      return {
        ...p,
        imageUrl,
      };
    });

    rssPostsWithImageUrl.push(pWithImageUrl);
  }


  // OGPç”»åƒã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
  // é‡è¤‡ã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã—ã¦ãƒ¦ãƒ‹ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã«ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
  const imageUrls = _uniq(rssPostsWithImageUrl.filter(p => p.imageUrl).map(p => p.imageUrl));

  await Promise.all(imageUrls.map(async imageUrl => {
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: imageUrl,
      cache,
      store,
      createNode: actions.createNode,
      createNodeId: createNodeId,
    });

    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'ThumbnailImage',
      value: 'true',
    });
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'link',
      value: imageUrl,
    });

    return fileNode;
  }));


  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°è¨˜äº‹ã”ã¨ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç”Ÿæˆ
  rssPostsWithImageUrl.forEach(p => {
    const contentDigest = crypto.createHash(`md5`)
      .update(JSON.stringify(p))
      .digest('hex');
    
    const excerpt = 
    actions.createNode({
      ...p,
      id: createNodeId(`${INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST}${p.link}`),
      children: [],
      parent: `__SOURCE__`,
      internal: {
        type: INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST,
        contentDigest,
      },
    });
  });
};


// è¨˜äº‹è¦ç´„ã¯è¨˜äº‹æœ¬æ–‡ã‹ã‚‰æŠ½å‡º
function excerpt(html, maxLength) {
  const rowText = striptags(html, '<pre>')
    .replace(/<pre[\s\S]+?>[\s\S]+?<\/pre>/g, '')
    .replace(/\n/g, '')
    .replace(/ /g, '')
    .trim();
  return rowText.length >= maxLength
    ? rowText.substring(0, maxLength) + '...'
    : rowText;
}

import React from "react"
import { Field, getIn } from 'formik';

// Formikã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
export default ({ name }) => (
  <Field
    name={name}
    render={({ form }) => {
      const error = getIn(form.errors, name);
      const touch = getIn(form.touched, name);
      cosnt isShowError = touch && error;

      return isShowError
        ? <div>{error}</div>
        : null;
    }}
  />
);

// ã‚µãƒ–ãƒŸãƒƒãƒˆå‡¦ç†
const handleSubmit = (values, actions) => {

  // FormDataä½œæˆ
  const  params = new FormData();

  params.append('form-name', values['form-name']);  // for Netlify Forms
  params.append('bot-field', values['bot-field']);  // for Netlify Forms
  params.append('sampleText', values['sampleText']);
  params.append('sampleFile', values['sampleFile']);

  // Formikã®é€ä¿¡ä¸­ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ³ã«ã™ã‚‹
  actions.setSubmitting(true);
  // axiosã§éåŒæœŸã«ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’é€ä¿¡
  axios({
    method: "POST",
    headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
    data: params,
    url: "/"
  }).then(res => {
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡å®Œäº†å¾Œ
    // ä»–ç”»é¢ã«é·ç§»ï¼ˆåŒæœŸé·ç§»ã§ã¯ãªãSPAã¨ã—ã¦ã®é·ç§»ï¼‰
    navigate('/application-complete');
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ å†…å®¹åˆæœŸåŒ–
    actions.resetForm();

    // æœ€å¾Œã«Formikã®é€ä¿¡ä¸­ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ•ã«ã™ã‚‹
    actions.setSubmitting(false);

    // ãªã«ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
    actions.setSubmitting(false);

    /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */
  });
}

import React from 'react'
import Helmet from 'react-helmet'
import * as config from '../config/blog-config.js';

export default function createJSONLDTag({
  isRoot,      // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‹ï¼ˆè¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®å ´åˆfalseï¼‰
  title,       // è¨˜äº‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ï¼ˆè¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®æ™‚ã®ã¿æŒ‡å®šï¼‰
  description, // è¨˜äº‹æ¦‚è¦ï¼ˆè¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®æ™‚ã®ã¿æŒ‡å®šï¼‰
  postUrl,     // è¨˜äº‹URLï¼ˆè¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®æ™‚ã®ã¿æŒ‡å®š)
  postDate,    // è¨˜äº‹æ›´æ–°æ—¥ï¼ˆè¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®æ™‚ã®ã¿æŒ‡å®šï¼‰
}) {

  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ç®¡ç†è€…ï¼ˆè‡ªåˆ†ï¼‰
  const author = [
    {
      '@type': 'Person',
      name: config.blogAuthor,
      description: config.blogAuthorDescription,
      image: {
        '@type': 'ImageObject',
        url: config.blogAuthorAvatarUrl,
        width: 60,
        height: 60
      },
      'url': config.blogUrl,
      "sameAs": [
        config.blogAuthorFacebookUrl,
        config.blogAuthorTwitterUrl,
      ]
    },
    {
      '@type': 'thing',
      name: config.blogAuthor,
      sameas: config.blogTitle,
      url: config.blogURL,
      image: {
        '@type': 'ImageObject',
        url: config.blogImageUrl,
        width: 60,
        height: 60
      }
    }
  ];

  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ç™ºè¡Œè€…ï¼ˆè‡ªåˆ†ï¼‰
  const publisher = {
    '@type': 'Organization',
    name: config.blogAuthor,
    description: config.blogAuthorDescription,
    logo: {
      '@type': 'ImageObject',
      url: config.blogAuthorAvatarUrl,
      width: 60,
      height: 60
    }
  }

  // JSON+LDã®è¨­å®š
  const jsonLdConfigs = [
    {
      '@context': 'http://schema.org',
      '@type': 'WebSite',
      inLanguage: 'ja',
      url: config.blogUrl,
      name: title,
      alternateName: config.blogTitle,
      image: config.blogImageUrl,
      description: config.blogAuthorDescription,
      author,
      publisher,
      potentialAction: {
        '@type': "SearchAction",
        target: `${config.blogUrl}/search?q={q}`,
        'query-input': 'required name=q'
      }
    }
  ];

  if (!isRoot) {
    // ãƒ‘ãƒ³ããšãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆè¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã®è¨­å®š
    jsonLdConfigs.push({
        '@context': 'http://schema.org',
        '@type': 'BreadcrumbList',
        itemListElement: [
          {
            '@type': 'ListItem',
            position: 1,
            item: {
              '@id': postUrl,
              name: title,
              image: config.blogImageUrl,
            },
          },
        ],
    }),
    jsonLdConfigs.push({
        '@context': 'http://schema.org',
        '@type': 'BlogPosting',
        url: config.blogURL,
        name: title,
        alternateName: config.blogTitle,
        headline: title,
        image: {
          '@type': 'ImageObject',
          url: config.blogImageUrl,
        },
        description,
        datePublished: postDate,
        dateModified: postDate,
        mainEntityOfPage: {
          '@type': 'WebPage',
          '@id': config.blogUrl
        },
        author,
        publisher,
      });
  };

  return (
    <Helmet>
      <script type="application/ld+json">{JSON.stringify(jsonLdConfigs)}</script>
    </Helmet>
  )
}
